lyrics.lyric: Young and Beautiful
lyrics.tlyric: 风华正茂

lyrics.lyric: I've seen the world
lyrics.tlyric: 我已看遍世间繁华

lyrics.lyric: Done it all, had my cake now
lyrics.tlyric: 历经沧桑，享受甜美的果实

lyrics.lyric: Diamonds, brilliant, and Bel Air now
lyrics.tlyric: 如今有钻石珠宝，名声显赫，坐拥豪宅

lyrics.lyric: Hot summer nights,mid July
lyrics.tlyric: 仲夏夜茫，七月未央

lyrics.lyric: When you and I were forever wild
lyrics.tlyric: 我们年少轻狂，不惧岁月漫长

lyrics.lyric: The crazy days, the city lights
lyrics.tlyric: 纵情时光，华灯初上

lyrics.lyric: The way you'd play with me like a child
lyrics.tlyric: 我们嬉戏疯狂，童稚之心难藏

lyrics.lyric: Will you still love me
lyrics.tlyric: 你是否爱我如初，直到地久天长

lyrics.lyric: when I'm no longer young and beautiful
lyrics.tlyric: 当我年华老去，容颜不再

lyrics.tlyric: 你是否爱我如初，直到地久天长

lyrics.lyric: Channeling angels in, the new age now

lyrics.lyric: Hot summer days, rock and roll
lyrics.tlyric: 白日盛夏，摇滚震耳欲聋

lyrics.lyric: The way you'd play for me at your show
lyrics.tlyric: 你华装登场，独为我而唱
